website_summaries.verdict: Stake-style solar lights designed for pathway use. Add additional light to your walkway, or stick these in the ground around your landscaping or garden. Includes four lights.
pros: Appealing flickering flame effect that looks incredibly realistic from afar
Once charged, these torches stay lit for up to 12 hours
Plant stakes along driveways, pathways, or in gardens
Excellent customer service from the company
Built-in sensor turns lights on at sundown
cons: Plastic stems are not as high-quality as the rest of the lights

customer_reviews.title: SO beautiful & realistic!
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the great reviews, I decided to give these a try and they are absolutely as amazing as everyone said they were! Right out of the box they stayed lit for over 8 hrs the first night and the flickering flame is so realistic that from 10 ft away you honestly cannot tell that it's not a real flame. Friends are already asking where I got them :) Love, love, love them and will definitely be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Kujav98

customer_reviews.title: The flicker in this light is more foggy in appearance which I was a little disappointed in, They don't look as real
customer_reviews.text: They look very close to real, They run all night which is a plus too, I,m sure I will buy more for the back yard also, If you watch the video you will notice I have 2 wall mounted Tom care Solar lights, The flicker in this light is more foggy in appearance which I was a little disappointed in, They don't look as real. I do recommend these lights
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Enchanting flames
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous. I live in the nw which means I have a lot of cloud cover.. First use I charged inside and the flickered all night.. Since we've had bad weather and so they die out in about 4 hrs.. The flickering flame is enchanting
customer_reviews.author: elhilborn

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic lights
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I read the reviews before I bought them and I must agree. I have been working on my back yard patio area and bought 4 to try. My yard has a lot of trees and is shady most of the time. I wasn't sure if there would be enough light to work, but I charged them and they came on once it got completely dark and when I got up at 6 am they were still on. They look really neat and realistic. I'll be buying about 8 more to do the rest of the area.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen williams

customer_reviews.title: looks nice but very bad quality, don't buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: my mistake is I bought 2 sets (8 lights) December 12, 2018 it was sitting at my garage because here was winter 3 weeks ago sun shop up and i start to use it. In 3 weeks 3 of them stop to working. I want to inform seller for exchange but return/exchange time was over Jan.31st.2019. It looks really nice and not cheap light but quality is so cheap Thank you Amazon Thank you seller!!! I will never buy any electronic items from AMAZON, You can find better quality at COSTCO also you can return anytime defective items. Umit-NEWJERSEY
customer_reviews.author: beykozmak

customer_reviews.title: Started out great, but after a month....
customer_reviews.text: Received these lamps and the first 4 weeks of use, they looked fantastic. Like tiki torches burning, so realistic. They stayed lit all night long. After 4 weeks, one lamp quit operating, now about 2.5 months later, only 1 is lit at night. Very disappointing for the cost of the lights, they did not even make it through a summer season and we have had our share of 100 degree days so lack of sun is not the issue..
customer_reviews.author: Karen J.

customer_reviews.title: Some arrive working and some arrive broken.
customer_reviews.text: When these lights arrive in working condition they are beautiful and work great. When you receive them broken or not working than it’s a problem. I’ve had to order more than I need so I can have the correct amount of working lights.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G.

customer_reviews.title: Good for a few months
customer_reviews.text: Great while they have lasted. 5 months after purchasing one won’t turn on and one won’t turn off
customer_reviews.author: Tyrizal

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These lights has not worked since I got them. $200.00 down the drain!
customer_reviews.author: rita

customer_reviews.title: Must-have garden lights
customer_reviews.text: Love these solar torches. They light up my yard every night for about 10 hrs from dusk to dawn. We got them last yr, and they’re still working perfectly. Also, TomCare’s customer service is excellent too. Highly recommend these lights.
customer_reviews.author: lthai

customer_reviews.title: Best torch solar lights!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing!!! Look like real torches around my pool..First night after charging and when I pushed the on button my response was..OMG YOU ARE KIDDING ME!!! They look just like real flickering flames.I cant imagine any better solar lights. THE BEST.I will be buying more in the spring.
customer_reviews.author: vicki lotts

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: The lights work great, and we've received many complements from neighbors. However, the light sensor doesn't work properly near street lights--2 of 3 lights installed near the street light would not come on automatically. The solution was to cover about 3% of the top panel with black electrical tape (luckily perfect color match) to cause the light to come on when it gets dark. This solves the auto on/off issue but also reduces the solar recharging of the batteries on partially cloudy days. This isn't a major problem for me in sunny Sothern California.
customer_reviews.author: misa

customer_reviews.title: Solar Tiki Torches
customer_reviews.text: Work great. Thought these would look good lining the walkway from the house to the driveway and i wasn't wrong. Looks amazingly like real flames and from a distance you'd be hard pressed to say it wasn't. They seem to last the advertised 12 hours. Its getting darker earlier so in the morning when i get up one or two are off but they charge back up during the day and are right back on when it gets dark. They actually put off a pretty good amount of light so you can see where you're going. I only ordered one set of 4 but I'll be adding another set or two soon.
customer_reviews.author: Dave C.

customer_reviews.title: ILOVE these lights/torches.
customer_reviews.text: I love these Solar Lights!!! They look like real torches. I don't know how they do it, but I watch with fascination as the "flames" flicker. I put them in my flower planters around my patio. These would make a great gift. I showed my friends and they LOVE them. They could not be easier to set up. I set them out in the morning to charge, and they went on at dusk for several hours.
customer_reviews.author: Gale

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Unacceptable, less than a year into these lights and (2) out of (8) will not turn on! I am guessing at least half of these reviews are BS.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy B.

customer_reviews.title: Mystical flame that cannot be extinguished
customer_reviews.text: This is the Eternal Flame from Odin's vault! These lights are amazing!! I used to have the older, 2 LED, flickering tiki torches and these blow them away. So realistic. They do need direct sunlight if you want them to stay on for more than an hour. I had to reposition mine as they have been in the fall shade. Other than that, they are amazing! I'll be getting more.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: More Garbage Dumped on us from China
customer_reviews.text: Two of the four lights don't work at all. Three of the support posts are already cracked, thin plastic who knew. Beware, and look at the origin for the manufacturer prior to purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Howard

customer_reviews.title: Only worked 2 nights before went dark.
customer_reviews.text: Loved lamps but only came on 2 evenings before more than half went dark. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Super Shopper

customer_reviews.title: There are truly amazing and look like real flames, but...
customer_reviews.text: I loved this item when I purchased it, unfortunately, less than a year later, 2 of the 4 lights no longer work. The switch that turns them on and off is defective. So, now I have half a set that still works. As much as I do (did) love the ambiance of the lights, I would not recommend purchasing this item. To get LESS than one years worth of usage is disappointing to say the least. I am sure these must come with a warranty, but there is no 'Seller' information provided by Amazon to pursue any replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful accent to my garden!
customer_reviews.text: These look great! Not sure if they come pre-charged, but I charged for 1 day and they lasted all night, didn't go off until dawn light shut them off. It's been a couple weeks and these are performing great. If you get them a full charge during the day, they last all night until the dawn shuts them back off. I'm probably going to order more...
customer_reviews.author: FolsomGal123

customer_reviews.title: They look beautiful but. . .  .
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love how they flicker in the backyard. I have taller ones also. I got these as a Christmas present but living in the Midwest, I could not use them until just recently. Well I have 2 that are now working after only 3 weeks no matter how much sun they get. The return policy is from date of shipment and will not work with me. They look great as long as you don't mind buying replacements every few weeks. Great idea. . look for a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Battaglia

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC CUSTOMER SERVICE and Cool Lights
customer_reviews.text: FIrst of all the lights look great! I've had lots of compliments on them and they add a very cool ambiance to my yard. Most importantly, for me was the excellent customer service I received. I had one of the lights go out and I thought, oh well, I"m probably out of luck. I emailed TomCare and less than 24 hours later I had a reply asking about the model and telling me they would replace it. Within 3 days I had my new light delivered. Really exceptional service. I highly recommend buying from this company. Thanks for taking care of your customers.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: One of the plastic poles broke as I was putting it in the ground
customer_reviews.text: Now this one torch is completely useless. I have tried everything to contact someone for a replacement, but no response. Maybe this review will get someone's attention because this EASILY could have been a 5 star. This is my second order of these.
customer_reviews.author: Flaskk

customer_reviews.title: Tough and Tasteful
customer_reviews.text: After 1 month, these solar torches so far have stood up to some pretty rainy days in NC. Good to know they are waterproof. The flames are bright as advertised. Flicker is realistic. Overall appearance is quite tasteful. Slight drawback is that two of the torches seem to be fading out consistently before the other two. This is a minor issue since they are literally going for more than 8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: pb3805

customer_reviews.title: CANNOT REPLACE BATTERIES
customer_reviews.text: BE FOREWARNED - The battery packs are NOT replaceable which means when the batteries go bad...you have to buy more lanterns, just like I did. How long do the batteries last? I live in Houston TX, plenty of daily sun and my original order of 4 torches lasted 13 months. After 13 months, 2 of the 4 torches are completely dead, 1 of the torches operates 24/7/365, even in the daytime, and only 1 of 4 is still operating normally. They do look neat, they do burn for a long time when the sun goes down. Just know that for your ambiance, it will require on ongoing order of torches.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Stockholder

customer_reviews.title: Longevity Questionable
customer_reviews.text: These 4 torches are brilliant and make a dramatic focal point in our courtyard. They are very realistic looking. However, 2 of the 4 begin to fade in brilliancy after a few hours turned on at sunset while 2 remain brilliant into the wee hours of sunrise. Tonight 1 of the 4 is completely dark only after being on for about 3 hours. All 4 are exposed to the same amount of desert sun. Easy to assemble and has the ability to choose different heights since it comes with individual posts.
customer_reviews.author: lag

customer_reviews.title: Not working after 1 month
customer_reviews.text: If I were writing this review a month ago it would have been fantastic. They look great. I was about to buy more for gifts and I had recommended them to friends. I am sorry to say that 3 of the 8 torches stopped working after a month and I don't know how long it will take for the others to die. It's too bad because they do look great while they are functioning.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bean

customer_reviews.title: Unique, beautiful and look so real...
customer_reviews.text: I love solar lights and have had several different styles through the years. But when I saw these solar ‘Flickering Flame Torches, I knew they had to be mine. The flickering lights are so cool and real looking. Opened them up and they were flickering with only 30 minutes in the sun. Amazing. My three year old granddaughter absolutely loves these and call them ‘her little fires.’ I’ll be excited to see how they hold up this summer in the AZ heat. I’ll update if any issues come up.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Missy

customer_reviews.title: 50% failure rate
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 lights. All 4 worked on arrival. Now, two of them have stopped working. The fire effect is great. They're nice and tall. They're bright enough to cast light but not so bright that you get blind spots in your peripheral vision. For the price, however, they're hardly disposable -- and with a 50% failure rate less than a month after purchase, I'm really disappointed. Also, just in case the manufacturer ever reads this: you really need to use sturdier plastic. The construction feels pretty cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Agresta

customer_reviews.title: Still working great
customer_reviews.text: The poles felt a little flimsy but they haven't broken even in really strong wind. They do occasionally need straightening as strong wind will cause them to lean a little. My solution was to go to Lowe's and buy 3/4" metal conduit. Cut one end into a point for driving into the ground, paint it black and you're good to go. The lights themselves however are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: lawrence hall

customer_reviews.title: On/Off switch broken
customer_reviews.text: I loved the looks of these lights. I purchased 4 of them 3 months ago and already one of the switches is not working. I only turn them on when we have company, so at most I have turned them on and off approximately 10 times. Hopefully the other 3 will keep working longer. There was only a 1 month warranty so I can't replace it. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: dukie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light, but the construction is plastic and not great
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light pattern. My wife loves the look. The entire product made of plastic. I thought these were metal by the pictures and price. The plastic is a light density polyethylene, which makes it look cheap in the day light and will fade with time in the sun. Plastic spikes make it neccassary to make a hole in the ground with a metal spike and the insert the torch’s spike. The plastic doesn’t fit tight when the shafts are put together, making the shafts to tilt and not stand perfectly straight. I am bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Levesque

customer_reviews.title: Amazing look from a solar light!
customer_reviews.text: I came across these and had to try them out. I purchased the 4 pack. While they’ve only been running for four days at this point, I really like them! I can’t wait for the warmer weather so I can sit outside and really enjoy them. They are attractive and the flickering light lasts several hours (so far). They arrived partially charged. I will say it was tough getting the stakes together because it is a tight fit, but otherwise it was fine. Purchased in April and as of October they are still going strong. I will be storing them for the winter, so I am not sure if they’ll still be functional next year.
customer_reviews.author: PenName NJ

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great but Don't Last
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a set in late February. They looked so nice and realistic we ordered another set a week later. That is now 4 months ago from today (8/11/19). A month after using the lights, one went out. We contacted the manufacturer and they sent out a replacement right away. Now, 4 months into owning them, another has gone out. We are past the 90 return window so out of luck. For the price, these lights should last more than 4 months. They look great but don't seem to last.
customer_reviews.author: atcbill

customer_reviews.title: Quit working! Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: They were pretty while they lasted, which wasn’t very long. They were handled and used carefully with 2 adults, no kids or pets. Two quit after a couple of weeks. We contacted seller and they replaced. Two more quit about two months later and now none of them work. No response from seller now. W-a-y too much money to throw away on lights that don’t work! Extremely disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: SusanB

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL! VERY BRIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: These are very bright and so pretty! They seem to be well made. They come with attachments to make them taller or shorter. I chose to keep mine shorter. There is an on/off button if you ever prefer to not have them come on for whatever reason. These look to be made very well. They do not look cheap. High quality! The flickering flame is beautiful. It looks like a real flame. I will update my review if they do not last long in the outdoor elements. So far so good! They are stunning!
customer_reviews.author: KinDallas

customer_reviews.title: Unique!
customer_reviews.text: I generally don't write reviews but I have really enjoyed this product. I have only had these for a few weeks but I was so impressed with the first four I bought four more and a few days later another four. I hope they last because I really enjoy watching these. The are so real looking that my neighbor showed up to tell us that she thought our house might be on fire.
customer_reviews.author: gmolony

customer_reviews.title: Great for a short time, sadly.
customer_reviews.text: Loved our lights for two summers and now only one works out of the four. We were sure to pack them away from harsh elements of winter but seems they are only meant to last for so long. Disappointed in longevity of product for price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: I put these up 2 weeks ago
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful. So I have a total of 12 And let me tell you they dress up my house would highly recommend they stay Lit till 6 o'clock in the morning. Even on a cloudy day they stay lit many many Hours. so bright. Would highly recommend. UPDATE: One of my lights 'pooped out'. I contacted TomCare and they got back to me immediately. They replaced the defective light immediately. Their customer service is terrific. I dealt with "Ann". Would highly recommend this product. BRAVO to TomCare!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Brings the Tropical Getaway to my Backyard
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't really expecting too much from these flickering lights, as I had seen others that didn't look realistic and were not very bright. I was ecstatic when they came on the first night that I put them out!! They were bright and the flickering was very realistic. Very mesmerizing to look at while sitting on the back porch. They completely transformed my backyard to a relaxing getaway on a tropical island. I bought a two-pack of these lanterns for a friend, and she absolutely loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great for our outside ambiance at night
customer_reviews.text: I was cautious when I first purchased a set of these TomCare Solar Lights. My wife loved them so I purchased four more sets for our patio and pool area. Previously I was using Tiki Torches...what a nuisance having to fill and light the torch when we were to use them. Now, these solar lights come on each evening and remain on all night. Our first set has been in place a year and a half without missing a beat each night. We have enjoyed them so much that we have purchased two sets each of these solar lights for friends. They cannot say enough about them. What a great gift they make. Miles
customer_reviews.author: Miles

customer_reviews.title: Love these torches
customer_reviews.text: Great tiki torch. Fun for our backyard. Lights up right after opening the extremely well packed items. Especially like the option to turn off the solar power to save the battery which we will do during winter storage. Flames look awesome, realistic. We used black zip ties to attach to our black fence. Looks ahh-mazing! Plan to buy another set to go all the way around. So cool, everyone comments on them. If you're trying to decide- you won't regret. Only caution is, if you plan to put in the ground, could be difficult as they are plastic. I wouldn't reccomend (find another way to display)
customer_reviews.author: Fashionable

customer_reviews.title: ... at a rented beach house and immediately fell in love with them
customer_reviews.text: Saw these while on vacation in Florida at a rented beach house and immediately fell in love with them. Ordered 8 to enhance our own backyard. Each light comes with 2 connectable pieces of PVC the material which give it great height over foliage. You can mix an match these so that on light uses 3 extensions giving it significant height and leaving the remaining light with only 1 extension which works well for a lower lighting situation. Simple to install, light lasts ALL NIGHT LONG and now the envy of my neighbors! Highly recommend this product. You'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago guy

customer_reviews.title: Great look great quality.
customer_reviews.text: This brand has the most realistic fire glowing look that I have seen. There are cheaper brands out there but I have found that the just don’t compare to these. This brand has the longevity like no other. Lasts well through the evening. I live in Florida so these run daily year round for 2 years and still going strong. Just remember when using for the first time after a good solar charge and they don’t turn on at dusk as expected.........push the on button! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Suzan W.

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof Flickering Flame torches 💕. They look real and last throughout the night.
customer_reviews.text: I recommend these solar lights. Really looks like a flickering flame. Stays charged for 10 hrs. Flickering just as strong when I woke the next morning. You can adjust the height. I will update later regarding the durability of these.
customer_reviews.author: Charm Lover

customer_reviews.title: They look like the real deal
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these solar torches! Unfortunately one stopped working within days and sunshine has been abundant, I’ve tried everything to get the one to work so it’s a bit disappointing, however I’m enjoying the three remaining working ones. My neighbor thought they were real, she said they were still going at 5 am. They lend a wonderful summertime party atmosphere without any fuss and worry with real flame.
customer_reviews.author: V. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great but they do not produce the orange ones any longer...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these and they sent me originally the orange ones. However, a few months later, 2 stopped working and they were very nice to send me the replacements for free. However, the replacements were the ones with a yellow flame. The orange flame is what makes these lights mesmerizing, the yellow is dull and won't have the same effect. In fact, the yellow, makes the flame look fake which is where the mesmerizing effect gets lost.
customer_reviews.author: Techie

customer_reviews.title: Update rating
customer_reviews.text: I got these for Christmas. I love love loved them. BUT about 2 months ago, one just went out, never to come on again and one is barely showing. Two others are burning bright. For Basically $80 I don't think 2 out of 4 is a very good bargain. I certainly expected to get at the very least a year or two out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing and is sure to get a "wow" reaction when seen in person
customer_reviews.text: We have a landscaping business and have purchased several sets of these for clients and each time we install them the reaction is always the same...wow!!! The faux flames is so realistic they could easily pass for a real tiki torch except it's even better because there's no mess filling cans with oil and a danger of having an open flame. The glow time is as long as it states and most of our clients leave them out most of the year with no problems. The price point may seem a little more than the standard solar lights but these are definitely not average. This truly is an amazing product and we will continue to recommend them to our customers.
customer_reviews.author: carrie.thompson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE to August. I haven’t had them a full year yet as I purchased them in November 2019. I have had three out of the four burn out. I purchased from another company and those seem to have lasted longer. So my review is even though they are beautiful, you won’t get a year’s use out of them. I won’t be purchasing from this seller again. All I could say is “These lights are amazingly beautiful”!!!! I received them today and they charged in less than five hours. I’m so thankful I bought two sets. I just may buy more if I can find a place to put them. This is one purchase you will NOT regret!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Lectora

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Incorrect order shipped. I bought a set of TomCare solar lights and loved them. I liked them so much I placed a second order the very next day after receiving and trying them. However, imagine my surprise when I received the second order. Instead of the flickering flame I received a transitioning colored light. They were not bright and not half as good. On calling the customer care their response was return it and we'll give you your money. I wish they would ship me the correct lights instead.
customer_reviews.author: Sindhu

customer_reviews.title: Love these lights
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these lights 3 times now and love them. We live in Costa Rica and I was afraid with all of the rain and humidity that they would have a problem. Not one failure. They always work. Every time we go back to the States we buy a few more and bring them in our luggage. Our neighbors ask us where we bought them. WE have a big property and have them all over. I'm going to try Amazon from here now that they ship here. They just opened a huge facility in the city of Heredia. Maybe I can have them delivered direct. If so I won't have to fillmy luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!
customer_reviews.text: Bought my first set, put them up, loved the way they looked. The next day our neighbors from across the street came over to say how much they loved them. I bought two more sets, mine for the back yard and a box for the neighbors. They're very happy and we are loving the look. Hint: when you turn the power on put your have over the top. They should light up, all mine did. If not, hit the power button again. Update, the neighbors had guests and they wanted the light too.
customer_reviews.author: B. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing - they look like real fire. I’ve had them for over a month now, they’ve been exposed to some intense weather conditions - still as bright, and stay on as long as day one. My husbands wakes up for work at 5am - they’re always still on and they really only get about 5 hours of afternoon sun. I’ve gotten so many compliments and have recommended them to dozens of friends. I will be buying more myself!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best solar lights we have!
customer_reviews.text: We love our fire solar lights! They are so pretty and I love that they have the extra extension to make them taller for the winter. They are bright enough to light our walkway up and stay on all night. My neighbor has a different brand and hers stop lighting a few hours after dark. Ours stay lit until the sun is up. I highly recommend these TomCare fire solar lights if your are looking for something different to set your home apart from your neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: NanaD

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for several months now and they are holding up well through the heat and rain of a Florida summer. They are still going strong all the way from sunset until sunrise, so battery life has been well over 10 hours. The flame effect is very good from distance, and they still look nice even up close, casting a warm glow in my back yard. The only drawback is that the poles are made of plastic. It is good that they will not rust, but I did crack one when I knocked into it while working in my yard the other day. My neighbor was so impressed with these that he bought his own set.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: I didn't give a longevity rating because its only been about a month
customer_reviews.text: These torches are beautiful and look like a real fire in the torches. Neighbors have come to see them at night because they thought they real. They are so nice that my father decided to purchase some. He found a better deal though. He got them on Amazon, but they were 6 for 69.99. They are bright and consistent every night. They have been out in 90-degree weather and rain for the last 30 days and still look brand new.
customer_reviews.author: camerola00

customer_reviews.title: Looks like real fire
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how they did it but it does look like a real fire. Using these in two pots to make them look like fire pots. Couldn't find anything that was solar to exactly meet my needs. This is as close as I could get. I'm very happy with them they really make the space. So dramatic. I did note the ground poles were a little chintzy and you would have to take great care getting them into the ground , but I'm going pole free. I am hoping this company will make some solar fire that will fill the space in my pots. Until then, I love these and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product backed by professionalism
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the quick delivery of the product and how well everything was packaged. Everything looks just as I hoped it would and I'm sure he's going to love the lights. I love the different options for height & will probably need to order more once he sees them. Unfortunately, it's a birthday gift and we still need to wait a bit before we see how everything works, but I am confident based on how concerned this company has been about my satisfaction with the lights I am not the least bit worried. Thank you for your professionalism and follow up.
customer_reviews.author: YC

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: These lights are soooo gorgeous... We purchased them to put on my father's grave at the cemetery and they exceed our wildness expectations. They look like mini torches and the light flickers just like a flame. The illumination is amazing and you can see from a distance. My dad's eternal flame burns brightly with these lights.
customer_reviews.author: monienonie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fire simulation
customer_reviews.text: You couldn't ask for anything more in terms of a simulation and customer service is good too. I can't rate longevity as they have only been functioning for a week. Previous experiences with solar powered lighting here in Arizona have not been good. Our heat and sun seems to send the life of solar items quickly. And those of plastic get brittle very fast. Hoping that is not the case here. Instruction manual has two problems: they do not tell you how to determine if the toggle switch is on or off and no place to contact listed for problems, although you can go via Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, will see with a follow up in 6 months as the longevity progress.
customer_reviews.text: Received order promptly, very well packed. Lights seem well constructed and after proper charging seem to work well, and stays bright till morning. Hopefully longevity will exceed my expectations, will check back in with a report in a couple months 10 months later and these light have exceeded my expectations by far. Solar panels still look almost new, and light is just as bright as when they were new. I live in Florida and the summer heat this year has been brutal and we’ve had the usual thunderstorms and again the lights have been exceptional!!!! Gave a set to my kid this past Christmas, also in Florida and he reports the the results. Buying another soon. Differently a good buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Beachbum

customer_reviews.title: After solar torch charges, remember to turn button on.
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to dislike about this product. These solar torches look exactly like flaming torches with no hassle. Do not think that they do not do as pictured. They do. But you have to have a couple of good sunny days to charge them, and you need to charge them in the off position. When you turn them on, and you can do that at twilight, you are not going to get how they really look until dark. (Lest I confuse you, they stay off after you place them until you think they are fully charged. Then turn them on anytime and wait for dark.) And then, Enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy M Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Love the look, but not short life
customer_reviews.text: We love the look of these and have had them for about 2 years. We don’t leave them on all the time, only push the button if we’re expecting guests, so they’re not used more than 20 night per year. In the winter we brought them inside and now 2 years in 3 of the 4 don’t light up anymore. The battery cannot be replaced. Pretty pricey if you have to re-purchase every 2 years. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: One of them doesn’t even turn on and 2 of the 4 are missing the extension poles and 3 are missing the connector. I paid 80$ for these. Edit: I am changing my review to 5 stars because they have the best customer service. They have sent me the missing items and replacement immediately and everything works now. I am very happy with my purchase the lights are beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Marjan Mahdjoubi

customer_reviews.title: Raddest Solar Lights Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a bit hesitant on buying any type of solar lights, because let’s be real, solar lights have a lifespan of little or no time. I pulled these out of the box, put together easily and popped them in the ground at sunset thinking they wouldn't light up. Woke up at 3am and they were still running, with little to know light. And I'll admit, SUPER cool! @UPDATE@ Okay it’s been almost a month and I’m not going to lie... I’m EXTREMELY impressed with the lights ability to go ALL night! I attached two pictures that were taken at 5:30AM and still going strong. I’m not at ALL disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: OMG - LOVE LOVE LOVE THESE.  Hard to go inside after dark when these light up
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable how 'real' the lights are to a tiki flame.....the color and brightness are just like what you'd expect from a tiki torch. We bought 2 sets. One set of 4 at our front porch and the other set of 4 at the gate of our pool area. Now we can enjoy fireless tiki torch lights without having to deal with the hassle of adding fuel. At 1st we found ourselves waiting for sunset to watch them come on. Absolutely magical & provides that 'awwww' feel of watching a flame. So relaxing. you will NOT be dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki D.

customer_reviews.title: You will love these
customer_reviews.text: Lights look like real firey torches. Warm amber flicker casts bright glow. Fun to watch them come on automatically at dusk. Very easy to install. Look best if height is staggered by leaving out a section of connector rods. Made of durable black plastic that imitate metal very well. I purchased 2 sets and the 8 torches were plenty to light up our big Multilevel backyard patio , walkway and stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Luna Tuna

customer_reviews.title: Happy thus far!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wife and I love these torches. They are not overly bright and add just the right amount of relaxing ambiance to our deck. Cannot speak to longevity as I’ve not owned them long enough but they appear to be well made. Torches come on at dusk and go off at dawn perfectly. They have no signs of wear despite “Georgia ❄️” aka... pollen, rain storms, wind gusts, etc. While not indistinguishable from a genuine torch, these remain an admirable emulation of a natural flame. Very satisfied at this point.
customer_reviews.author: John Williamson

customer_reviews.title: It has to be very dark out
customer_reviews.text: These arrived and all 4 worked and they charged fine. The current issue is that they don’t come on until it’s really dark out, wishing they weren’t so sensitive to light. When we have our real tiki torches burning, the flame puts too much light out and stops these from coming on. I’ll have to place farther away from the patio or they’ll never come on. But they are otherwise cool looking
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Striking effects
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly but the ON/OFF switch switch position can't be determined. After two lights came on I hit the button on the others and was up and running. These lights look absolutely amazing. My son has a bunch of these and told me they are still running fine after many months. You just can't take your eyes off of them. I just ordered two more. As an update after 8 months two of my eight units have failed. Not impressive since my cheapy Sam's club solar lights go five years. They do look good, however, so I stayed with five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Very Realistic!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and most of them said the lights were very realistic, but I did not believe it until I installed them and I showed them to my wife and the first thing she said was "that is real fire, are they going to burn something?" UPDATE: after having 2 sets for a few months and having tried 2 other brands of solar lights we decided these lights are the best for us. They have been super reliable so we purchased a 3rd set of 4.
customer_reviews.author: peter sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Lights are beautiful but when inserting into ground the stake cracks and ...
customer_reviews.text: Stakes are cheaply made. Lights are beautiful but when inserting into ground the stake cracks and breaks so it won't hold the light firmly. We used a rubber mallet and have never had any trouble with the other yard lights we have. I am planning on returning them only because of the stakes..
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Hill

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lights - and they truly do flicker
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these lights. I bought 8 in April and they looked FABULOUS along otherwise dark steps on the side of my house. By July, however, one was coming on during the day and a week later burned out completely. Now in August, a second tiki has fallen. I attached a photo from my cell phone where I tried to capture 2 that are flickering next to the 2 that have perished. Good news is that the tiki bar is still open, but I am interested to see how long the remaining 6 last. Update - the seller responded to my problem immediately and sent to new lights. They work great and I am pleased with the customer service
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Gives home a quiet sense of elegance
customer_reviews.text: These are the prettiest outdoor lights! They look like the old-fashioned gas lamps. They stay lit all night & recharge all day. I’m totally pleased with them. They have even stayed put in pretty strong wind & rain. I had seen real gas lamps and lanterns on extremely expensive older homes, and these give the same look without the expense of running gas lines & installing fixtures. I think anyone who places these next to landscaping beside a nicely manicured lawn would be very pleased with how they look in the evening.
customer_reviews.author: Garden Lady

customer_reviews.title: Check the warranty
customer_reviews.text: purchased these in January. One has stopped working and it’s September.
customer_reviews.author: Lovestoshopdotcom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ambient light, can be used in planters!
customer_reviews.text: These are PERFECT for my small rooftop space (and would be awesome for a porch) that doesn’t have electricity directly to it. They literally took 30 seconds to put together. I placed them in two flower pots and a divider planter. You def don’t need a big pot (I have them in a 12’ with flowers around the base), but they stay sturdy! The light is very flame-like and mellow. It sets a great night ambiance, giving just enough light to read if close. Ordering another set for more awesome lighting by the outdoor tables!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Bosley

customer_reviews.title: Ditto on all the great reviews
customer_reviews.text: I have had these lanterns for 1 year, they are worry and maintenance free and an excellent alternative to smelly, open flame tiki lamps. the assorted sections allow the owner to place torches at varying heights along their garden. Great evening ambiance.
customer_reviews.author: J. S. Leopold

customer_reviews.title: Love These Torches!
customer_reviews.text: We've had our torches for 2-3 years and they are magnificent! The ambiance that they create in our backyard is amazing. Love the reflections on the pool and light play on the plants. They remain lit throughout the night even with significant cloud cover during the day. Many of our friends go home and buy them after visiting us. We give them as gifts for housewarmings and the hard to buy friends and family. Can't recommend them enough!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Super fun and pretty
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome, look like tiki torches. Easy to put in the ground with a rubber hammer to tap in the permanent bases. Not sure on longevity as only had for a couple of weeks. The outsides are plastic, so will have to see how they hold up under Sun and weather. But at this point I love them, and make me smile when I look out at night and see them flickering like fire!
customer_reviews.author: Jana H Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: can i give this a 10 star review?
customer_reviews.text: my best purchase ever on amazon yet! quality is good lighting is good hight is good it makes my yard a romantic places i want to sit and stare at them for hours! bought another set 2 days after i received the first one! flames are pretty good look like real flames
customer_reviews.author: sasar

customer_reviews.title: A real beauty
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice and very realistic. Of course I've only had them for a day. Update: I've had these for about a year now, and I leave them outside rain and snow and they continue to perform without flaw. It's March and it's dark at about 8 when they turn on, and when I get up to go to work at 4 am they are still on but much less, and that's with winter/spring sun. They really do look like real fire torches. I have four of them in my pool area and it looks great all night. No problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kumara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lights
customer_reviews.text: I had 4 that I had previously purchased and ordered 4 more. These are a wonderful addition to my garden. They are great to look at and I receive compliments from everyone who sees them in action. I love the flame look and highly recommend. I haven't had them long enough to rate longevity so I gave it only 4 stars. I followed the instructions and let them charge in the sunlight for 3 days before switching them on. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M from CulverCity

customer_reviews.title: Flames are realistic!
customer_reviews.text: I just love these lights! They look awesome along my sidewalk! It does take a day or 2 for charging. The flames look real, and they are bright! I had a ground stake missing from my order, but I contacted them, and they sent me the part within 2 days! I would recommend this company for purchases. Again, these lights are very attractive, and very easy to assemble., yet they aren't flimsy. The poles are a heavy duty plastic, and are very easy to work with. Enjoying this 4pc set!
customer_reviews.author: LCU

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect, very realistic
customer_reviews.text: These solar flickering flame lights are very nice. They really do look like flames, but without the hassle. They come on and off on schedule every evening and have worked perfectly. We are really pleased with them and they make our deck look really nice in the evening. The poles are plastic so, if you are expecting metal, they are not. But they have been sturdy and we have had no problems. We are completely satisfied with our purchase and are way worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: SBonner

customer_reviews.title: That Tiki flame flicker
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit picey, but they are amazing! Our neighbors had a few sets, they have really stood up over time and that is what prompted us to pick up some too. They look awesome and put off a good amount of light and ambiance. They are still flickering away in the early morning. I looked at some cheaper options and they were just that, cheap. Sticking with these!
customer_reviews.author: REIGNSoner

customer_reviews.title: Nighttime Dream!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to put out by our dock at night for special lighting. Have had these now for almost 2 months and they work like a charm. They look just like a torch at night when they come on. I like them so well I bought three more sets for Christmas presents for my friends and family. I am always cautious about these types of products but they even offer a warranty that cost almost nothing I suggest that you purchase it even though I don’t know that I will need it. I love these. Thanks to this company for making such an awesome quality product which is so rare in these days.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: These things look like a real fire and every night I cannot wait to see them come on and light up my backyard... They cast a decent amount of light, but again they are very similar to fire so it is far like that they are casting... My friends are jealous and they all want them... Cannot say enough good about these! They are tractive to look at an even more fun to enjoy when the sun goes down
customer_reviews.author: SnapHap45

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I needed to write this review before I went to bed. This is how impressed I am I keep going outside to look at the solar lights and how real they look. I wouldn’t be surprised if someone calls the fire department reporting an open fire. My lights are in the front yard and clearly visible from the street. An amazing idea. They “loaded” on an overcast day and are super bright at night. Super easy to assemble and come with extra pieces for height.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: beautiful realistic looking
customer_reviews.text: These tiki torches are great! Very realistic looking "flame" light. Bright and fun to watch flickering. The only downside is that we have a bright mercury vapor light in the lot next door & the torches wouldn't come on in the area we wanted to put them in. So, we moved to a darker part of the yard & they work wonderfully! Also it has to be almost completely dark before they come on. I would recommend them! UPDATE: We purchased another set for my son & family & they love them as much as we do!! This is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: titangal

customer_reviews.title: when they work they are great
customer_reviews.text: This is the second set I ordered. First set is much better than the new set. New set two of the lights only seem to hold a charge for two to three hours, even with a full day of sun for charging. Not sure it it is the quality of the new sets or I just got a two lemons. Again the first four I ordered are still great and out preforming the newer set. I just waited to long to report this to the seller so Im not sure if they would replace these "faulty" items
customer_reviews.author: daniel d.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not reliable long term
customer_reviews.text: I have 12 of these lights. The first set of 4 i purchased seemed to do well so I kept buying more. I now have only 7 lights that still work. Some only worked for a matter of weeks before they just randomly go dark. Frustrating because when they work they are amazing. Everyone loves them. But they’re just not reliable or consistent in quality at all.
customer_reviews.author: Karen H

customer_reviews.title: Love these!  EXCEPT after 8 months one of them no longer works.
customer_reviews.text: Have had these up on our deck for about a week and I love them. They light up easily even on days with little sun and are still going strong way into the night. They seem well made and look like a real torches. They're just the right amount of light-not too much but just enough so we can see our way to the hot tub safely without turning on lights. After 8 months one no longer works. Still love the other three but so disappointed the one isn't working. Unsure if I should reorder the same ones or try something different.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: One torch marches to a different drummer
customer_reviews.text: One torch marches to a different drummer. He burns great all day but once the sun goes down he’s spent from all that work! The other three recharge and rest all day awaiting a long night of lighting the path. For a while our special torch had gone dormant but then all of a sudden he resurrected, however, his circadian rhythms are a bit askew.
customer_reviews.author: Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic lights
customer_reviews.text: I first saw these lights at my parents' vacation home. My sister ordered them and was so happy with them she wrote a review (she normally doesn't). They look so realistic--like a real tiki torch, but one that's waterproof and storm proof. Three of the four lights lit up right out of the box. After charging all day, they lit up our back yard. They even stayed lit during a heavy rain/thunderstorm! Next year I'm going to mount these on our pool fence. I may order more! Wonderful product, and with Prime, they were waiting for us by the time we got home from my parent's house.
customer_reviews.author: Jan H.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing simulation!
customer_reviews.text: I was very reluctant to purchase these because of the high price, but due to the reviews I took a chance. So for these have exceeded my expectations and they don’t look like a fake torch light at all it’s amazing how realistic they look. My main concern was that some people have stated they don’t last very long and have failed in less than a year. I hope that’s not true but we’re having so much fun with them I’m thinking about buying more even at this price . Highly recommended but you have to put them in a place of direct sunlight where they can re-charge during the day. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Rygman

customer_reviews.title: WOW they look real
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, one concern when I bought them- would they look real or very fake. They look real whether you are outside with them or looking from indoors. Very nice accent piece for any yard, soft lighting to the ground below. No to bright just as a real torch should be like. Using around our above ground pool entry area. I am considering buying another set
customer_reviews.author: CarrOk

customer_reviews.title: i love these lights but one stopped working
customer_reviews.text: and when i tried to push the button the plastic cover came off and then the inside button fell out. its too dark out right now for me to find it but i am dissappointed that it fell out like that. these are expensive products and should have more longevity. hopefully ill call the seller tomorowo to see what he can do for me. ill update again.
customer_reviews.author: Jannki Mithaiwala

customer_reviews.title: Keeps on working
customer_reviews.text: 2nd Texas summer and they are still working fine. I ordered two to try and loved them so much I bought 10 more to put along the fence around my back yard. Only one of the 12 broke due to lawnmower, not the fault of Tom Care. I just built brackets to mount them to my fence as I plan on keeping them around for years. Heck, I was expecting them to last one year (as my friends told me they would) but after a North Texas Summer/Winter and now nearly through this summer. I’m sold
customer_reviews.author: Scottc

customer_reviews.title: Very Realistic
customer_reviews.text: These exceeded my expectations!! The flame flicker is so realistic looking, and they are beautiful torches!! We have them along our front porch (the railing caps aren’t on, so we set the torch poles in the railing, just the top of the torch sits on top). Have only had them a couple of days so can’t speak for longevity but these look and work amazing so far!!
customer_reviews.author: JR

product_meta.title: TomCare Solar Lights Upgraded, Waterproof Flickering Flames Torches Lights Outdoor Solar Spotlights Landscape Decoration Lighting Dusk to Dawn Auto On/Off Security Torch Light for Patio Driveway (4)
product_meta.description:
Tips: 
Prior to first use, charging the light for two sunny days. 
If battery capacity reduces over time, switch the light off for 3-5 sunny days in order to boost the batteries. 

Description:
The TomCare torch light NEVER NEEDS BATTERIES. COMPLETELY RUNS ON SOLAR POWER.
Now you can have the warm torch light without ever having to light a match or throw a switch. 
Best of all, there are no dangerous flames — LEDs in the light cast a safe, soft, mood-enhancing glow.
During the daytime, they are retracted, and absorbing solar energy. At dusk, they literally pop up and light up, giving you lights along a pathway, driveway, deck or dock that aren't in your way during the day. Includes installation hardware, completely wireless. Powered by a lithium ion rechargeable battery that's solar powered. Up to 12 hours working time after fully charged.

Specifications:
Weight: 259g
LED: 96PCS 
Size: 43*4.7*4.7 inch
Li-ion battery: 2200mAh
Solar panel: 0.88W, 17% efficiency
Charging Time: 8 hours
Working Time: Up to 12 hours after fully charged

Features:
Ambient lighting ideal for your patio, deck or garden
Automatically turns on at dusk and off at dawn
Normal operating time is 12 hours in summer
No wiring required — simply install and enjoy
Eco-friendly solar technology (powered by an integral mono crystalline solar panel)

Package includes:
4 x Solar Torch Lights
8 x Extend Pipe
4 x Plastic Ground Spike 4 x Plastic Connector 
1 x Manual
feature_bullets: GORGEOUS DANCING FLAMES DESIGN: A safe alternative to the real “flames” — LEDs in the light cast a safe, soft, mood-enhancing glow. Please note the actual height of the item is 43 inches.
NEVER NEEDS BATTERIES, COMPLETELY RUNS ON SOLAR POWER: It collects solar energy all day, then turns on automatically at dusk. The light runs on solar power, so you can place it anywhere!
LONG WORKING TIME - Built-in rechargeable Li-ion battery (2200mAh). Light up 12 hours after fully charged. Charging time: 8 hours.
WEATHER RESISTANCE: Waterproof and Durable, withstand all kinds of weather all round the year.
EASY INSTALLATION: No wiring required, simply install it anywhere you like and enjoy the warm torch light.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars4,556 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
